mapper.sql: id, control_unit_code, check_locale_code, alarm_level, alarm_wind_speed, alarm_wind_direction, wind_speed1, wind_direction1, wind_speed2, wind_direction2, speed_limit, speed_limit_section_number, speed_limit_section_begin, speed_limit_section_end, data_length, Influence_interval, branch_line_code, reserve1, reserve2, `date`, alarm_status, relieve_time, video_up_status, check_locale_kilometre
mapper.select:
SELECT v.video_code,ws.startTime,ws.endTime,ws.tableName,ws.id from ( SELECT w.id id,w.date startTime,w.relieve_time endTime,w.check_locale_code+0 localeCode ,"wind" tableName from wind_speed_alarm w where w.alarm_status='1' and w.video_up_status='0' UNION ALL SELECT r.id id,r.date startTime,r.relieve_time endTime,r.check_locale_code+0 localeCode ,"rain" tableName from rain_alarm r where r.alarm_status='1' and r.video_up_status='0'
UNION ALL SELECT s.id id,s.date startTime,s.relieve_time endTime,s.check_locale_code+0 localeCode ,"snow" tableName from snow_alarm s where s.alarm_status='1' and s.video_up_status='0' UNION ALL SELECT f.id id,f.date startTime,f.relieve_time endTime,f.check_locale_code+0 localeCode ,"foreign" tableName from foreign_body_alarm f where f.alarm_status='1' and f.video_up_status='0' ) ws join ( SELECT replace(replace(vk.startKilometer,'K',''),'+','')+0 startK,replace(replace(vk.endKilometer,'K',''),'+','')+0 endK ,vk.video_code from video_kilometer vk ) v on ws.localeCode >=v.startK and ws.localeCode < =v.endK;
mapper.insert: insert into wind_speed_alarm (id, control_unit_code, check_locale_code, alarm_level, alarm_wind_speed, alarm_wind_direction, wind_speed1, wind_direction1, wind_speed2, wind_direction2, speed_limit, speed_limit_section_number, speed_limit_section_begin, speed_limit_section_end, data_length, Influence_interval, branch_line_code, reserve1, reserve2, `date`, alarm_status, relieve_time, video_up_status, check_locale_kilometre, `data`) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkLocaleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmWindSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmWindDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windSpeed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windDirection1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windSpeed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windDirection2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speedLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speedLimitSectionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speedLimitSectionBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speedLimitSectionEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{influenceInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchLineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relieveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{videoUpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkLocaleKilometre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into wind_speed_alarm
id,
control_unit_code,
check_locale_code,
alarm_level,
alarm_wind_speed,
alarm_wind_direction,
wind_speed1,
wind_direction1,

speed_limit_section_number,
speed_limit_section_begin,
speed_limit_section_end,
data_length,
Influence_interval,
branch_line_code,
reserve1,
reserve2,
`date`,
alarm_status,
relieve_time,
video_up_status,
check_locale_kilometre,
`data`,
